Our Legendary Process

💡

Ideation & Validation

Source and validate ideas through customer discovery and market research.

⚡

MVP Development

Rapid prototyping and MVP development with cross-functional teams.

🧪

Customer Testing

Deploy MVP to real users, collect feedback, and iterate quickly.

🏢

Company Formation

Formally establish the company and recruit dedicated leadership.

🚀

Go-to-Market

Launch with a strong GTM strategy and scale operations.

12-Month Legendary Journey

  1. 1-2

    Foundation

    Idea sourcing, market research, problem validation

  2. 3-4

    Build

    MVP development, team assembly

  3. 5-6

    Launch

    MVP launch, early user feedback, iteration

  4. 7-9

    Refine

    Product refinement, initial GTM experiments

  5. 10-11

    Scale

    Scaling GTM, tracking PMF metrics, founder onboarding

  6. 12

    Legendary

    Product-market fit assessment, scale-up planning
